title.label: I love this game BUT... We need to talk about ‚Äúsaving‚Äù the game.

content.label:
I‚Äôve had to ‚Äúswap to a previous save‚Äù twice now because I threw away an important item like iridum bars, and then threw out another thing so it‚Äôs unrecoverable. 
The issue is that when you swap to the previous save, it has sent me both times to a few days back. This doesn‚Äôt make sense to me because every night between days, it does a full ‚Äúsave‚Äù. I do not like having to repeat several days in a row as I can‚Äôt remember everything I had planned previously. üôÅ

title.label: PLEASE PUT THIS ON THE FRONT PAGE!!!READ THIS!!!

content.label:
Trust me, this is a WICKED AWESOME GAME! This is the only farm game I enjoy! It‚Äôs not even all about farming! One of the huge things is that you can get MARRIED! I totally LOVE this!! I first did Sam, then I tryed Elliot! And I‚Äôm still going with him! (Elliot) A lot of you think Elliot is a sadist poet that is annoyingly dramatic, but I LIKE him! He has red hair, (orange is my favorite color, he can say some pretty poetic things if you marry him! Like really poetic! Every night, I come to him, and he will say the most romantic things! It‚Äôs cool! I have 2 children. (In the game. I am only 10.) My first one, (girl) I named Eliza. I chose it, because I like the name, and sounds almost Elliot! For my son, who is now crawling I think...  
I named him Andy. Because my name in Stardew Valley is Anna. My real name is Dagmar. I love this game! It is so addictive! Please respond, ConcernedApe! I really like this game! Can you please make an update with more single townsfolk? I would LOVE that!

This game is great it‚Äôs just that to get anything good you really gotta grind, like a lot. So maybe in the next patch or update you could add a little bit more ways to get stone and cool gems or finding geodes just a tad bit easier. 
Thank you 
Ps: THIS GAME IS THE BEST

title.label: So worth it. BUT HEY A GLITCH

content.label:
I haven‚Äôt been so excited about a game since I was 12. I‚Äôm 26 now. To the guy who made this: Thank you for making me feel like a kid again.

(PS the interior could use a better system for handling/ placing items. I‚Äôm constantly picking things up when I didn‚Äôt mean to and making a mess of things. Also, weird glitch on the mobile version. I can‚Äôt place anything on my walls anymore. Windows and pictures. Used to be able to just fine. This isn‚Äôt a problem on my steam files.)
i love the game but whenever i try to start it up, it shows the chuckle fish and then crashes and it really annoys me
I wish that there was an ‚Äúadd to existing stack‚Äù button like there is on the desktop version! Also, multiplayer would be soooooo great on mobile

I‚Äôve debated buying the mobile game for some time now and once I did it there were no regrets! The game transitioned to mobile very smoothly and my concerns about touchy controls were wasted. It‚Äôs so nice to have the comfort of Stardew Valley in my pocket! The game uses no internet so when I‚Äôm away from wifi I don‚Äôt worry about using up my bandwidth. It also doesn‚Äôt drain my battery like a lot of other games do. I can easily play for an hour or two and still have plenty of battery left.

Seriously, best mobile game purchase I‚Äôve made in a long time! 5/5 stars!

title.label: One of the best games out there

content.label: I originally got this on my ps4 on a whim. I loved it on there so I went ahead and bought it here so I could play it anywhere. I‚Äôve put so many hours into this game and have loved every second. One of the best, most relaxing games ever
Stardew Valley is truly amazing. Well worth the $3.99 on sale!
This is the best game ever!üòÑ

As someone who‚Äôs used to nothing MMOs and first-person shooters, this is a nice change of pace when I need to unwind. Plenty of stuff to do and it actually makes you think and plan out your days if you want to be productive and have the most payout the next day and beyond. I first tried it out on my PS4 and was instantly hooked. It‚Äôs like if Link from The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past decided to never go on an adventure and start a farm instead. üòÇ The graphics and some of the animations certainly pay homage to it.

There‚Äôs a few bugs, just like in the console, except one big one on mobile is that the game crashes from time to time. I don‚Äôt mind that much since unless I‚Äôm over halfway through the day, but it needs to be fixed ASAP. Other than that, it‚Äôs a great game well worth the money!

I really love this game but i have a few problems, so the first problem is that you should be able to get multiple pets like dogs and cats, also you should be able to rename your pets, and another problem is that you should be able to get trucks, cars, and tractors, and another thing is that you should be able to buy more land and if you dont like your current land for example i have the beach type of land and i think if you bought more land you could choose what is would be like the forest or mountains, you should also be able to move your house, and another thing is that you should be able to hire workers and assign them to sertain jobs like farming or choping trees, and your kids should be able to grow bigger so then you could assign them to jobs, also you should be able to pick up animals,and you also should be able to buy stone and quartz from clint, also hay better be much cheeper im really struggling to feed my animals,AND yes i know this is alot, also once you unlock  the green house you should be able to upgrade it and you also should be able to move the green house and buy more from robin, and another thing is that you should be able to fly to the city and other places, and there should be more exotic animals you could get like llamas and other exotic animals, and if you get chickens you could also get roosters and roosters would give you chickens a boost in laying eggs and the eggs would be a better quality, so you could have six roosters in one coop and roosters would not count as chickens so in the max upgraded shed you could still have 12 hens and 6 roosters, one rooster would be 1200 because everyone would want a rooster, and you could also get bulls, they would be like roosters but they give cows a boost in milk and the milk is higher quality, the more you feed and pet you bulls and roosters the better boosts they would give, and one bull would be 2100 because everyone would want a boost, also this is one of my favorite games but please add all of this and then it would be my favorite hame in the world, please add this, and thats all goodbye!...

title.label: Love this game but I wish..

content.label: I absolutely love this game! I have it on my switch and phone. I have literally put hours into multiple files. The only request I would make is that it has a way you could login or share the file you have between multiple systems. I‚Äôve gotten really far in my switch file, but with life getting busier lately I don‚Äôt have time to play my switch as much. I do, however have my phone that is easier  to carry with me. This allows me to play for a little bit here or there. When I am home though I love to play the game on my switch on the tv. The updates that allow for more farm styles and other great things is so nice!

You need to pay 500 coins (in game) to change! I honestly didn't want to do this, so i think you should make it free to change yourself or at least you can only change your self every 2 months or something. Please think about this. Other than that AMAZING GAME!!

I have a few game update ideas ü§ó

1. Hunting 
Being able to go in the woods and hunt deer, bears, cougars, etc.

2.dog in the mines 
Being able to take you dog in the mines with you would be cool. He could help you fight monsters and find rare items.

3 . Carrying your baby around the farm/town
Being able to carry your baby and walk around would be so cool! Maybe even carry him/her around town and in events!! Oh and also you kids playing with you dogs,pigs, goats,chicken, etc.

4. More than 1 dog/cat

5. More horse pattens/coats

I really hope you see thisn

When I first saw Stardew valley on the AppStore, I didn‚Äôt buy it because I wasn‚Äôt sure if it was worth my money. Later, I decided to buy it and have been hooked ever since. This is the sort of game that I‚Äôll play like a maniac for about a week or so, not touch it for a month, and then go back in and start playing again. It‚Äôs a well written, fun, and engaging game that is 100% worth every penny.

Ok so I‚Äôm gonna hop straight to the point so here goes:

-The overall game is very nice, once you figure everything out it‚Äôs a very entertaining game and definitely worth the cost

-However, the instructions on the game aren‚Äôt the best. I had to google a lot of it to figure out how to play

-And there‚Äôs also a SUPER annoying bug. Idk if it‚Äôs just me or not, but sometimes I would purchase a virtual item in the game (with the game money, not real), and I would spend my hard-earned supplies on it, and then I finish the day in the game (and it‚Äôs supposedly ‚Äúsaved‚Äù), and I exit the game. And when I came back to it the money and supplies where taken but the purchase was never made. My point is, that I did stuff in the game, it was supposedly saved but I lost the progress. Note that I‚Äôm using a new IPad with strong WiFi connection. I‚Äôve lost quite a bit of progress due to this.
